column5: Fred Trost, the host of the the long running PBS television series "Michigan Outdoors" has passed away. I don't know how many of you have seen his how. For years our local cable tv provider sent our US feeds from Detroit, so I used to watch Fred weekly. Rest in peace Fred.  Fred Trost
Sad day Dan. I did get to watch him on occasion when I had the dish.
Enjoyed his show in the early/mid eighties.
